concept.title: AF PGI 5301.170-4 Administration of Peer Reviews

conbody.p:
The contracting officer simultaneously provides a copy of the memorandum documenting disposition of all Peer Review recommendations to OUSD(A&S)/DPC ,
SAF/AQC , and their SCO.
